title: RIP League Balance. Riot Catering to Low Elo Whiners and Nerfing Zoe.
body:
https://i.imgur.com/SdB8wTC.png

While these are actually buffs for good Zoe players, people will STILL complain about Zoe chunking damage.

I guess Riot saw too many bronzies upvoting clips of very fed Zoes one-shotting squishies on Reddit. Sad!
